main event: A witness observed a bluish-white object traveling in a southerly direction on July 10, 1966 in Macedonia, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was round with a smaller circle in the middle, and appeared to be about 300 feet in size.
The object traveled at a speed in excess of 100 mph, moving in a straight path and then almost straight up at about a 30 degree angle.
The witness estimated the object's speed to be 40-50 miles per hour.
The witness said the object was about the size of the moon.
The witness reported that the object did not appear to be transparent or give off smoke.
sighted object: a bluish-white round object with a smaller circle in the middle
